descriptionHtml:
[center]This little mod resizes the fan of skyrim\'s windmills.

When I saw the windmills for the first time I noticed the weird proportions of the sails.
They looked rather ridiculous and didn\'t fit to the size of the building. 
I was looking for some fixes, but it seemed that nobody cares about that issue.
So I decided to scale the fan 1.5 times.
It\'s only a small change, but makes traveling around in skyrim more authentic.

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

[url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url]

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

I made a smaller version for everyone who doesn\'t like the clipping issues at solitude\'s stable. 
The  optional file includes 1.23x bigger blades than in vanilla game. 
In my eyes that\'s a little to small, but I don\'t know how to fix it better for now and it still looks better than the small blades. 

If someone comes up with a better idea, like turning the mill at the farm, I\'ll add it. 

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

[youtube]vmFkTYtgEJ0[/youtube][youtube]CW53NN0aOZQ[/youtube]
[youtube]ZBr4tW12h5Y[/youtube]

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

Install into \"skyrim/data/\" folder or use NMM.

Do not upload it elsewhere. 

[img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j187/Eddi_01/trenner_zps0ae102f8.png[/img]

Cheers![/center]
author: Pfaffendrill
